author.name: Dr. Arjun Sharma
author.bio: A passionate researcher dedicated to exploring the depths of Vedic and Puranic literature. My work focuses on digital humanities and making ancient texts accessible to a modern audience.

content:
धातुकारिका प्रारम्भः
नत्वा नटेशं निखिलवर्णाम्नायादिदेशिकम्।
श्री कण्ठस्तनुते धातुकारिकां बालरञ्जनीम्।।1।।
कोशमामरसिंहं च बोधार्थं नामलिङ्गयोः।
धर्माधिकारि श्री चक्रवर्त्यय्यङ्गार्यनिर्मिताम्।।2।।
सुबन्तशब्दभेदानां बोधिनीं शब्दकारिकाम्।
अभ्यस्य तद्वद्धातूनामपि बोधार्थमिच्छताम्।।3।।
दुरध्ययत्वात्प्राचीनधातुपाठस्य सीदताम्।
कौतुकाद्याचमानानां बालानां परितुष्टये।।4।।
प्रागधातुपाठ एवाद्य काव्यमार्गे चरिष्णुभिः।
सुपठाभिस्सुबोधाभिः कारिकाभिर्यथाक्रमम्।।5।।
सङ्गृहयतेऽत्र सुधियो गर्हन्तां मां स्तुवन्तु वा।
भ्वाद्यादयो दशगणास्तथा कण्ड्वादिधातवः।।6।।
आत्मनेपदिनश्चात्र परस्मैपदिनस्तथा।

निबन्धसङ्ग्रहः

Shared from: Bhagavdgeeta, अर्जुन विषादयोग 1

समभूत्

Shared from: Bhagavdgeeta, अर्जुन विषादयोग 1

चिकित्सकशिरोमणिरभूत्

Shared from: Bhagavdgeeta, अर्जुन विषादयोग 1

समस्तभूमिपतिमान्या

Shared from: Bhagavdgeeta, अर्जुन विषादयोग 1

Case Study: Blood sugar levels showing improvement. Continue with protocol.

A clinical case study regarding Blood sugar levels showing improvement. Continue with protocol..

Case Summary

Case study for Aarav Sharma concerning Blood sugar levels showing improvement. Continue with protocol., created on July 21st, 2025.

Patient Presentation

The case involves **Aarav Sharma**, a 48-year-old Male.

Chief Complaint: Increased frequency of urination and persistent thirst.

Associated Complaints: N/A

Medication & Diet

Medication Protocol

  • Yogaraja Guggulu - 2 tablets (After Food)
  • Nishamalaki - 1 tablet (Before Food)

Special Instructions: Continue with light yoga and stretching.

Dietary & Lifestyle Advice

Diet: Continue with the previous diet plan. Monitor blood sugar levels regularly.

Lifestyle: Recommended regular yoga.

Diagnostics & Assessment

Diagnostic Findings

Ayurvedic Assessment

Diagnosis: Blood sugar levels showing improvement. Continue with protocol.

Dosha Imbalance: Vata-Pitta

Outcomes

Progress Notes: Patient reported improvement in subsequent visits.

Conclusion: The protocol was effective.

attachedWork.title: Bhagavdgeeta
attachedWork.description: The Bhagavad Gita, often referred to as the Gita, is a Hindu scripture, dated to the second or first century BCE, which forms part of the epic poem Mahabharata. The Gita is a synthesis of various strands of Indian religious thought, including the Vedic concept of dharma; samkhya-based yoga and jnana; and bhakti.

content: “The whole creation is made up of trio. The three elements of the nature unite as trio create this Triatic creation. ”
